group_1.textLeft: [chara:303150:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Woah~! Crazy!@It's super crowded!

group_1.textRight: It totally is since this buffet is the hottest topic@around.
This is my second visit, but even last time was cray-cray.
Both then and now are super insane!@Totally!

group_1.textLeft: Omg totally?!@[chara:303150:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:303150:cheek_1][chara:303150:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:303150:lipSynch_1]I'm looking forward to the craziness!
...Haah~ cold.@Hurry up and let us iiin!

group_1.textRight: Once we enter the restaurant, our spirits are@gonna soar crazy high!
The chill will fade soon, we just need a little bit of patience.

group_1.textLeft: No no, I'm already burning with excitement and@ about to explode.

group_1.textRight: I super get it! You're crazy!

group_1.textLeft: ...Hey, Ren...
Those two...waiting in line right now...
They're talking about a limited-time special winter@buffet, right?
Do you understand what they're saying? I keep@hearing words like "crazy" and "explode"...
...Yeah...@I'm at a loss too...

group_1.narration: "Emirin! It's so crazy!"@※Emiri!@The chocolate fondue is super cute.
"Huh, it totally is crazy!"@※The chocolate fondue isn't just cute,@it's delicious too.@It goes great with strawberries.
"Ah! This is so crazy, too!"@※Ah!@The cheese fondue here is also to die for.@When it comes to winter food,@you have to have fondue, right?
"What a crazy demon!"@※All you can eat crab at this price...@Talk about amazing!@All the tastes of winter are here.
"Hm... crazy!"@※What do I do...@With all these choices,@I'm lost on what to actually try.
"It's crazy! Totally crazy, right?"@※It really is.@But, everything here is all-you-can-eat!
"It's seriously crazy...!"@※Yeah, it's really seriously wild!

group_1.textRight: ...You guys...should learn to speak actual words.

group_1.textLeft: Eh...?@Are we saying crazy words or something?
It's not crazy, yeah? You understand, no prob?@[chara:300650:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300650:cheek_0][chara:300650:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300650:lipSynch_1]Right, Ren-pasu?!
Eh?! Seriously?!
That's crazy! We should be more careful.
Say, isn't Myako-senpai pretty crazy?

group_1.narration: "Nah, you're definitely crazy."@※Yeah, she's always saying difficult words.
"She's always reading crazy things, right?"@※Yep, she's always reading high level books.
"They're chemistry books! They're not crazy!"@※They're chemistry books! That's perfectly normal!

group_1.textRight: I mean it! Crazy, crazy crazy, stop just saying it@over and over!
I don't understand what you're trying to get at!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, you're serious.
Even though we say crazy, it's a different kind@of crazy: the good kind...

group_1.textRight: ...S-so, that's it...@...We got all mixed up...yes.

group_1.textLeft: Ehh...? Then can you explain what was wrong?@Can you?
[chara:300650:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.narration: "Crazy! Crazy is here!"@※What a difficult situation!@I absolutely have to try the buffet's specialty roast beef!@They have a limited time winter version.
"This is totally crazy! I have to go!"@※I have no choice but to grab it.@If I missed this opportunity,@I'd regret it forever.
"It's crazy! Let's run!"@※We absolutely can't miss eating it.@Let's go before it's all gone!

group_1.textLeft: ...Ugh... Guh...
My head's...spinning... No, I have a headache...@Ugh...no, I'm dizzy...
Which one is it...@Either way, my brain is going crazy...

group_1.textRight: ...Wh-what should I do...?@Just how...awful is it?

group_1.narration: "Crazy... like sick..."@※I was careless... My headache's cleared up...
